messages.message:
Small bug, when the prompt contains quotation marks `"`, thereâ€™s a backend GraphQL error.
Prompt: `What is the "name" of this patient?`
UI Response is empty string
Error returned by `run_sync` :
```"Exception Invalid query, got errors: [{'locations': [{'column': 352, 'line': 1}], 'message': 'Syntax Error GraphQL request (1:352) Expected :, found String \" of this patient?\"\\n\\n1: {Get{IB_AI_LABS_967f9e0e_44c6_47b0_9d9f_99b6fe8db6d8(where: {path: [\"ref_doc_id\"] operator: Equal valueString: \"naveen/my-repo/fs/Instabase Drive/zero_shot_idp/967f9e0e-44c6-47b0-9d9f-99b6fe8db6d8/documents/out/3978684-25866392_org_af68dea46985c7d6b9172592074c31951077ef578ac58b75dbc21aa44a586642.pdf.ibdoc\"} limit: 3 hybrid:{query: \"What is the \"name\" of this patient?\"```
Thanks Naveen! yeah we are tracking this.. Will fix it :+1::skin-tone-3:
